snippet.title: factori 1.0 Trailer: the Full Version of the GMTK 2021 Winning Game
snippet.description:
Download the free demo: https://stargardengames.itch.io/factori

The full version of factori is here, expanding on the jam game that won the 2021 GMTK Game Jam. factori is a game about creating all the letters of the alphabet from the letter i, chaining together a system of satisfying factories to form words.

factori 1.0 includes:
* more levels, letter recipes, & letter art
* supports combined reflections & rotations (factori technologi has come a long way)
* word of the day
* type your own words & build community-created words
* log recipes in your recipe journal
* find & collect hidden letter art in your scrap book
* track all the words you've made & your best scores
* compete against yourself & others in 3 scoring metrics
* reflectors and rotators have flipped states
* new music
* quality of life features like moving placed buildings, descriptive text under buildings, nodes grey out when you can't connect to them, faster fast-forward
* now supporting windows, mac & linux
* try the demo for free! https://stargardengames.itch.io/factori


Credits:

Water Wood & Stone
Audionautix | https://audionautix.com/ Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ 
Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/
